Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate the purgatorial beings in the Necromancer Tomb.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:471#3#ebonheart inquisitors}, {@LinkCreature:471#7#eldritch blood knights}, {@LinkCreature:471#900#vengeful shades}, {@LinkCreature:471#1#relentless disc reapers}, and {@LinkCreature:471#901#sawtooth reapers}.

Report to Valona when mission is complete.
Great job. Please continue to help us to fully eradicate these horrendous monsters.
The Necromancer Tomb must be completely subjugated. That means you, <PCNAME>.
